name: MoonBunnies
description:
"Have you heard about the legend of the moon bunnies?

Every night, the bunnies that live on the moon would go out and start dancing together.

They would jump and dance all night, until the sun rises.

Every night, a girl was looking at the moon, hoping to watch the bunnies dancing and jumping...

She could never catch a glimpse of the dancing bunnies, until that one night..."

Moon Bunnies is a very short platformer where you play a girl who picks up bunnies in order to help them get back to the moon.

The game was done as a final project in a Unity Course by "Hands On Games".

Development, Music and graphics by Uminetta
